section.p: To renounce the worship of Molhern, you must pay 40 Shards to the priesthood by way of compensation.
The sorcerer-priest shrugs his shoulders. ‘As you wish - turn your back on knowledge, it’s only the road to power, after all,’ he comments.

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith, pay the 40 Shards and delete Molhern from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
